events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on the morning of April 30th, involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection.
The submitted claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after verifying that it involved the policyholder's vehicle.
An insurance agent was assigned promptly to handle the claim and initiate contact with the policyholder to gather more details.
The claim has been officially acknowledged and the customer received confirmation along with next steps for document submission.
The customer was requested to provide photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimates for further investigation.
The policyholder submitted all requested documents including detailed repair bills and the official accident report for evaluation.
The investigation into the claim was started by the claims department to verify the validity and extent of the accident damages.
The investigation was completed confirming the accident details matched the customer’s report and damage was covered under the policy.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the repair costs along with compensation for the rental car during the vehicle's downtime.
The customer provided positive feedback on the handling of the claim process and appreciated the timely communication.
The claim was formally approved after the customer accepted the settlement proposal and agreed to the compensation terms.
The payment covering repair expenses and additional fees was issued to the customer’s designated bank account successfully.
The claim case was officially closed after confirming that the customer received final payment and all concerns were resolved.
The entire case documentation was archived in the system for record-keeping and future reference in accordance with policy.
